thread.section_title: Michael's House - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 2 nights in beijing
thread.title_full: 2 nights in beijing - Review of Michael's House, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Brian B
title: 2 nights in beijing
text:
Ok so it's entrance is down a slightly shabby side street but then this is the real beijing not some business / tourist only hotel.
Once your inside the elegant simplicity of the covered courtyard which all the rooms are connected too, with its comfy sofas and fish pond is a genuine insight in to how most chinese families would have lived albeit more luxurious surrounding ( proper western ensuites for one)
Staff were most hospitable and due to the small size of the hotel had the time to really make you feel like valued guests.
Absolutely loved it
